name: Bacon Breakaway
description:
Oink! Today could be its lucky day
Help the piggy runaway from the farm! Avoid getting caught while fulfilling your health needs...who knows, maybe eating a donut gives your piggy the boost it needs!

Game made for Bevy Jam #3

How to Play
When the game starts, try to escape by going up!

Eventually, they'll catch you and take you back to the farm...

There you can replenish your energy and improve your stamina

Once the piggy is strong and has enough stamina, you'll be able to finally break free!

Credits

Game Design: Captain_of_Coit & Captain_of_Coit's Wife

Programming: Captain_of_Coit

Graphics: Captain_of_Coit's Wife

Music: Captain_of_Coit

Source Code (MIT): https://github.com/Captain-Of-Coit/bacon-breakaway
